Welcome to HLA.Alleles.org

A comprehensive online resource offering information on HLA and HLA related genes

Naming Alleles

Describing how an allele is named using the HLA Nomenclature
Antigens

Tables listing all of the officially recognised HLA antigens, together with any previous official designations.
Genes

Information for all known HLA and HLA related genes, location on chromosome, function and references.
groups

HLA alleles that have identical nucleotide sequences across the exons encoding the peptide binding domains.
groups

HLA alleles having nucleotide sequences that encode the same protein sequence for the peptide binding domains.
About

Information on who we are and what we do.
